8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "There are two joys for the fasting person: the joy when he breaks his fast, and the joy of when he meets his Lord

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtues Of Fasting
